verses.verse: Finally <S%G3063><s%>, my <S%G3450><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%>, rejoice <S%G5463><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%>. To write <S%G1125><s%> the same things <S%G846><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%>, to me <S%G1698><s%> indeed <S%G3303><s%> is not <S%G3756><s%> irksome <S%G3636><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> for you <S%G5213><s%> it is safe <S%G804><s%>.
Beware <S%G991><s%> of the dogs <S%G2965><s%>, beware <S%G991><s%> of <S%G2040><s%> the evil <S%G2556><s%> workers <S%G2040><s%>, beware <S%G991><s%> of the concision <S%G2699><s%>:

for <S%G1063><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> are <S%G2070><s%> the circumcision <S%G4061><s%>, who worship <S%G3000><s%> by the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> glory <S%G2744><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> have <S%G3982><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> confidence <S%G3982><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%>:

though <S%G2539><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> myself might2192, 2532 have <S%G2192><s%> confidence <S%G4006><s%> even in <S%G1722><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%>: if <S%G1487><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> other <S%G243><s%> man <S%G5100><s%> thinketh <S%G1380><s%> to have confidence <S%G3982><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%>, I <S%G1473><s%> yet more <S%G3123><s%>:

circumcised <S%G4061><s%> the eighth <S%G3637><s%> day <S%G1537><s%>, of the stock <S%G1085><s%> of Israel <S%G2474><s%>, of the tribe <S%G5443><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> Benjamin <S%G958><s%>, a Hebrew <S%G1445><s%> of Hebrews <S%G1445><s%>; as touching <S%G2596><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%>, a Pharisee <S%G5330><s%>;

as touching <S%G2596><s%> zeal <S%G2205><s%>, persecuting <S%G1377><s%> the church <S%G1577><s%>; as touching <S%G2596><s%> the righteousness <S%G1343><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is <S%G1096><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%>, found blameless <S%G273><s%>.

Howbeit <S%G235><s%> what things <S%G3748><s%> were <S%G2258><s%> gain <S%G2771><s%> to me <S%G3427><s%>, these <S%G5023><s%> have I counted <S%G2233><s%> loss <S%G2209><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>.

Yea <S%G235><s%> verily <S%G3304><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> I count <S%G2233><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> to be <S%G1511><s%> loss <S%G2209><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> the excellency <S%G5242><s%> of the knowledge <S%G1108><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%>: for <S%G1223><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> I suffered the loss of <S%G2210><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> do count <S%G2233><s%> them but refuse <S%G4657><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> I <S%G1511><s%> may gain <S%G2770><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>,

and <S%G2532><s%> be found <S%G2147><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, not <S%G3361><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> a righteousness <S%G1343><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> mine own <S%G1699><s%>, even that which is <S%G3588><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> that which is <S%G3588><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> in Christ <S%G5547><s%>, the righteousness <S%G1343><s%> which is <S%G3588><s%> from God <S%G2316><s%> by <S%G1909><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%>:

that <S%G3588><s%> I may know <S%G1097><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the power <S%G1411><s%> of <S%G386><s%> his <S%G846><s%> resurrection <S%G386><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the fellowship <S%G2842><s%> of <S%G3804><s%> his <S%G846><s%> sufferings <S%G3804><s%>, becoming conformed unto <S%G4833><s%> his <S%G846><s%> death <S%G2288><s%>;
if <S%G1487><s%> by any means <S%G4459><s%> I may attain <S%G2658><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> the resurrection <S%G1815><s%> from the dead <S%G3498><s%>.

Not <S%G3756><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> I have <S%G2983><s%> already <S%G2235><s%> obtained <S%G2983><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> am <S%G5048><s%> already <S%G2235><s%> made perfect <S%G5048><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> I press on <S%G1377><s%>, if <S%G1487><s%> so be that <S%G2532><s%> I may lay hold <S%G2638><s%> on that for <S%G1909><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> I was laid hold <S%G2638><s%> on by <S%G5259><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>.

Brethren <S%G80><s%>, I <S%G1473><s%> count <S%G3049><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> myself <S%G1683><s%> yet to have laid hold <S%G2638><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> one thing <S%G1520><s%> I do <S%G1950><s%>, forgetting the things <S%G3303><s%> which are <S%G3588><s%> behind <S%G3694><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> stretching forward <S%G1901><s%> to the things which are <S%G3588><s%> before <S%G1715><s%>,

I press <S%G1377><s%> on toward <S%G2596><s%> the goal <S%G4649><s%> unto <S%G1909><s%> the prize <S%G1017><s%> of the <S%G2821><s%> high <S%G507><s%> calling <S%G2821><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>.

Let us <S%G5426><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%>, as many as <S%G3745><s%> are perfect <S%G5046><s%>, be thus <S%G5124><s%> minded <S%G5426><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> in anything <S%G5100><s%> ye are <S%G5426><s%> otherwise <S%G2088><s%> minded <S%G5426><s%>, this <S%G5124><s%> also shall God <S%G2316><s%> reveal601, 2532 unto you <S%G5213><s%>:
only <S%G4133><s%>, <S%G3739><s%> whereunto <S%G1519><s%> we have attained <S%G5348><s%>, by that <S%G2583><s%> same <S%G846><s%> rule <S%G2583><s%> let us846, 5426 walk <S%G4748><s%>.

Brethren <S%G80><s%>, be <S%G1096><s%> ye imitators together <S%G4831><s%> of me <S%G3450><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> mark <S%G4648><s%> them that so walk <S%G4043><s%> even as <S%G3779><s%> ye have <S%G2192><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> for <S%G2531><s%> an ensample <S%G5179><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> walk <S%G4043><s%>, of whom <S%G3739><s%> I told <S%G3004><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> often <S%G4178><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> tell you <S%G3004><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> weeping <S%G2799><s%>, that they are the enemies <S%G2190><s%> of the cross <S%G4716><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%>:

whose <S%G3739><s%> end <S%G5056><s%> is perdition <S%G684><s%>, whose <S%G3739><s%> god <S%G2316><s%> is the belly <S%G2836><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> whose glory <S%G1391><s%> is in <S%G1722><s%> their <S%G846><s%> shame <S%G152><s%>, who <S%G3588><s%> mind <S%G5426><s%> earthly things <S%G1919><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> citizenship <S%G4175><s%> is <S%G5225><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>; <S%G1537><s%> whence <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> we wait <S%G553><s%> for a Saviour <S%G4990><s%>, the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>:

who <S%G3739><s%> shall fashion <S%G3345><s%> anew the body <S%G4983><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> humiliation <S%G5014><s%>, that <S%G1519><s%> it <S%G846><s%> may be <S%G1096><s%> conformed to <S%G4832><s%> the body <S%G4983><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%>, according to <S%G2596><s%> the working <S%G1753><s%> whereby <S%G3588><s%> he <S%G846><s%> is able <S%G1410><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> to subject <S%G5293><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> unto himself <S%G1438><s%>.
